item.title: Justice for Austin Metcalf
item.description: A 17-year-old boy was stabbed to death. Activists portray the teen charged with murder as the real victim.

item.title: Why the Supreme Court Upheld the Order to Return Abrego Garcia from El Salvador
item.description: The Trump administration was foolish to believe it could deport aliens with no due process.

item.title: Trump Is Right About Showerheads
item.description: Joe Biden’s efforts to weaken water pressure are worth undoing.

item.title: U.K. Police: Whites Need Not Apply
item.description: West Yorkshire Police hiring processes continue an unfortunate national trend.

item.title: The Week: ‘Liberation Day’ Do-Over
item.description: Plus: Theodore McCarrick has died, a symbol of the Catholic Church’s response to its gravest modern scandal before becoming a scandal unto himself.
